sentences.en: A thick, woolen rug covers the floor behind the desk.
sentences.cn: 一块厚羊毛小地毯铺在写字台后面的地板上.

sentences.en: And whenever I saw woolen products advertised, I stopped to see what was on offer.
sentences.cn: 无论我在哪儿看见关于羊毛制品的广告，我都会停下来看看。

sentences.en: Figure 4 outlines the operations that take place in woolen and worsted fabric manufacturing.
sentences.cn: 图4概略表示出粗纺和精纺毛织物生产的工艺流程.

sentences.en: He had a red woolen muffler round his neck and his skin was rather reddish too.
sentences.cn: 他脖子上围了一个红色的羊毛围巾，他的皮肤也相当的暗红。

sentences.en: He's wearing a black leather jacket, blue jeans and a green woolen hat.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件皮夹克, 兰色牛仔裤,戴着一顶绿羊毛帽.

sentences.en: I loved the smell of cork grease and slide oil, of musty woolen uniforms, and the tangy dankness of brassy horn bells.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢闻松脂和黑色润滑油味道，喜欢闻羊毛制服的霉味和潮湿的黄铜喇叭的扑鼻气味。

sentences.en: In spite of the heat, he insisted on his woolen costume.
sentences.cn: 尽管很热, 他还是坚持穿着他的羊毛衫.

sentences.en: Jamie was snugly wrapped in a white woolen scarf.
sentences.cn: 杰米围着一条白色羊毛围巾舒适而暖和.

sentences.en: She likes to wear woolen socks in winter.
She makes me wear the woolen sweater.
She was wearing a woolen coat, with a cotton blouse underneath.
sentences.cn: 她外面穿了一件毛外套, 里面穿一件棉布衬衫.

sentences.en: The woolen sweaters you delivered do not match the sample we provided.
sentences.cn: 你们羊毛衫的交货和我们提供的样品不一致.

sentences.en: There is one bar of woolen blanket on that bed.
This wool stapler who is wearing woolen scarf is woolgathering.
sentences.cn: 这个戴着羊毛围巾的羊毛商心不在焉的.

sentences.en: What have you got in the way of woolen pull - overs ?
sentences.cn: 你们有些什么羊毛 套衫?

sentences.en: Will this soap shrink woolen clothes?
sentences.cn: 这种肥皂会使毛织品缩水 吗 ?

sentences.en: Wool fibers are processed into two fabric types: woolen fabrics and worsted fabrics.
sentences.cn: 羊毛纤维加工成两种织物类型,粗纺毛织物和精纺毛织物.

sentences.en: Woolen blankets often have fluff on them.
sentences.cn: 毛毯上经常带有柔软的绒毛.

words.tran_cn: 羊毛的；模糊的；似羊毛的
羊毛；毛线；绒线；毛织品；毛料衣物
羊毛工（把羊毛分类的人）

phrases.tran_cn: 纺毛织物；粗纺纤维；呢绒
